 if(All.isWebApplication)
{
	CxList inputs = Find_Interactive_Inputs();
	CxList outputs = Find_Interactive_Outputs()-Find_XSS_Outputs();

	CxList sanitized = Find_XSS_Sanitize();

	result = All.FindXSS(inputs, outputs, sanitized);
}
